author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Howard S. Jonas Reports 20.3 Pct Stake In Rafael Holdings As Of March 26, 2018
text:
29 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Howard S. Jonas Reports 20.3 Pct Stake In Rafael Holdings As Of March 26, 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Rafael Holdings Inc: 
* HOWARD S. JONAS REPORTS 20.3 PCT STAKE IN RAFAEL HOLDINGS INC AS OF MARCH 26, 2018 - SEC FILING Source text : ( bit.ly/2Hl1R0h ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
